name: Turtle Game
description:
A game about protecting a turtle from seagulls.

You play as a turtle  who is attacked by seagulls, Avoid the seagulls, collect coins (if you want to) and survive for as long as you can.

A simple game I have made in my free-time during the course of two weeks. With most of progress beeing done during the weekends.

I have started a few unfinished game projects, so i decided to finish this one. I did.
